Name: Programming
Description: Ability to write, design, and test code for software applications.

Name: Graphic Design
Description: Creating visual content using various tools and techniques.

Name: Data Analysis
Description: Analyzing and interpreting complex data sets to extract valuable insights.

Name: Project Management
Description: Planning, executing, and closing projects efficiently and effectively.

Name: Communication
Description: Expressing ideas clearly and effectively, both verbally and in writing.

Name: Problem Solving
Description: Analyzing problems and finding effective solutions.

Name: Time Management
Description: Efficiently organizing and prioritizing tasks to meet deadlines.

Name: Team Collaboration
Description: Working effectively with others to achieve common goals.

Name: Customer Service
Description: Providing excellent service and support to customers.

Name: Leadership
Description: Guiding and motivating a team to achieve shared objectives.

Name: Adaptability
Description: Quickly adjusting to new conditions and evolving situations.

Name: Critical Thinking
Description: Evaluating information and making reasoned decisions.

Name: Negotiation
Description: Reaching mutually beneficial agreements through effective communication.

Name: Creativity
Description: Thinking outside the box to generate innovative ideas and solutions.

Name: Networking
Description: Building and maintaining professional relationships for mutual benefit.
